00029     public enum RunStatus {
00030         NOT_RAN, ALREADY_RAN, RUN_AGAIN, INVALID_MD5SUM
00031     }

00045     private Set<String> validCheckSums = new HashSet<String>();

00053     public boolean shouldAlwaysRun() {
00054         return alwaysRun;

00058         return runOnChange;

00061     public ChangeSet(String id, String author, boolean alwaysRun, boolean runOnChange, String filePath, String physicalFilePath, String contextList, String dbmsList) {
00062         this.changes = new ArrayList<Change>();
00063         log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00064         this.id = id;
00065         this.author = author;
00066         this.filePath = filePath;
00067         this.physicalFilePath = physicalFilePath;
00068         this.alwaysRun = alwaysRun;
00069         this.runOnChange = runOnChange;
00070         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(contextList) != null) {
00071             String[] strings = contextList.toLowerCase().split(",");
00072             contexts = new HashSet<String>();
00073             for (String string : strings) {
00074                 contexts.add(string.trim().toLowerCase());
00075             }
00076         }
00077         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(dbmsList) != null) {
00078             String[] strings = dbmsList.toLowerCase().split(",");
00079             dbmsSet = new HashSet<String>();
00080             for (String string : strings) {
00081                 dbmsSet.add(string.trim().toLowerCase());
00082             }
00083         }
00084     }
00085 
00086     public String getFilePath() {
00087         return filePath;
00088     }
00089 
00090     public String getPhysicalFilePath() {
00091         if (physicalFilePath == null) {
00092             return filePath;
00093         } else {
00094             return physicalFilePath;
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     public String getMd5sum() {
00099         if (md5sum == null) {
00100             StringBuffer stringToMD5 = new StringBuffer();
00101             for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00102                 stringToMD5.append(change.getMD5Sum()).append(":");
00103             }
00104 
00105             md5sum = MD5Util.computeMD5(stringToMD5.toString());
00106         }
00107         return md5sum;
00108     }
00109 
00116     public boolean execute(Database database) throws MigrationFailedException {
00117 
00118         boolean skipChange = false;
00119         boolean markRan = true;
00120 
00121         try {
00122             database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Changeset " + toString());
00123             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getComments()) != null) {
00124                 String comments = getComments();
00125                 String[] lines = comments.split("\n");
00126                 for (int i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
00127                     if (i > 0) {
00128                         lines[i] = database.getLineComment() + " " + lines[i];
00129                     }
00130                 }
00131                 database.getJdbcTemplate().comment(StringUtils.join(Arrays.asList(lines), "\n"));
00132             }
00133 
00134             if (database.getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements() && rootPrecondition != null) {
00135                 try {
00136                     rootPrecondition.check(database, null);
00137                 } catch (PreconditionFailedException e) {
00138                     StringBuffer message = new StringBuffer();
00139                     message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00140                     for (FailedPrecondition invalid : e.getFailedPreconditions()) {
00141                         message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString());
00142                         message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00143                     }
00144 
00145                     if (rootPrecondition.getOnFail().equals(Preconditions.FailOption.HALT)) {
00146                         e.printStackTrace();
00147                         throw new MigrationFailedException(this, message.toString());
00148                     } else if (rootPrecondition.getOnFail().equals(Preconditions.FailOption.CONTINUE)) {
00149                         skipChange = true;
00150                         markRan = false;
00151 
00152                         log.log(Level.INFO, "Continuing past ChangeSet: " + toString() +" due to precondition failure: " + message);
00153                     } else if (rootPrecondition.getOnFail().equals(Preconditions.FailOption.MARK_RAN)) {
00154                         skipChange = true;
00155 
00156                         log.log(Level.INFO, "Marking ChangeSet: " + toString() +" ran due to precondition failure: " + message);
00157                     } else if (rootPrecondition.getOnFail().equals(Preconditions.FailOption.WARN)) {
00158                         log.log(Level.WARNING, "Running change set despite failed precondition.  ChangeSet: " + toString() + ": " + message);
00159                     } else {
00160                         throw new MigrationFailedException(this, "Unexpected precondition onFail attribute: "+rootPrecondition.getOnFail());
00161                     }
00162                 } catch (PreconditionErrorException e) {
00163                     StringBuffer message = new StringBuffer();
00164                     message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00165                     for (ErrorPrecondition invalid : e.getErrorPreconditions()) {
00166                         message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString());
00167                         message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00168                     }
00169 
00170                     if (rootPrecondition.getOnError().equals(Preconditions.ErrorOption.HALT)) {
00171                         throw new MigrationFailedException(this, message.toString());
00172                     } else if (rootPrecondition.getOnError().equals(Preconditions.ErrorOption.CONTINUE)) {
00173                         skipChange = true;
00174                         markRan = false;
00175 
00176                         log.log(Level.INFO, "Continuing past ChangeSet: " + toString() +" due to precondition error: " + message);
00177                     } else if (rootPrecondition.getOnError().equals(Preconditions.ErrorOption.MARK_RAN)) {
00178                         skipChange = true;
00179                         markRan = true;
00180 
00181                         log.log(Level.INFO, "Marking ChangeSet: " + toString() +" due ran to precondition error: " + message);
00182                     } else if (rootPrecondition.getOnError().equals(Preconditions.ErrorOption.WARN)) {
00183                         log.log(Level.WARNING, "Running change set despite errored precondition.  ChangeSet: " + toString() + ": " + message);
00184                     } else {
00185                         throw new MigrationFailedException(this, "Unexpected precondition onError attribute: "+rootPrecondition.getOnError());
00186                     }
00187 
00188                     database.rollback();
00189                 }
00190             }
00191 
00192             if (!skipChange) {
00193                 for (Change change : changes) {
00194                     try {
00195                         change.setUp();
00196                     } catch (SetupException se) {
00197                         throw new MigrationFailedException(this, se);
00198                     }
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 log.finest("Reading ChangeSet: " + toString());
00202                 for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00203                     change.executeStatements(database);
00204                     log.finest(change.getConfirmationMessage());
00205                 }
00206 
00207                 database.commit();
00208                 log.finest("ChangeSet " + toString() + " has been successfully run.");
00209 
00210                 database.commit();
00211             } else {
00212                 log.finest("Skipping ChangeSet: " + toString());
00213             }
00214 
00215         } catch (Exception e) {
00216             try {
00217                 database.rollback();
00218             } catch (Exception e1) {
00219                 throw new MigrationFailedException(this, e);
00220             }
00221             if (getFailOnError() != null && !getFailOnError()) {
00222                 log.log(Level.INFO, "Change set " + toString(false) + " failed, but failOnError was false", e);
00223             } else {
00224                 if (e instanceof MigrationFailedException) {
00225                     throw ((MigrationFailedException) e);
00226                 } else {
00227                     throw new MigrationFailedException(this, e);
00228                 }
00229             }
00230         }
00231         return markRan;
00232     }
00233 
00234     public void rolback(Database database) throws RollbackFailedException {
00235         try {
00236             database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Rolling Back ChangeSet: " + toString());
00237             if (rollBackChanges != null && rollBackChanges.size() > 0) {
00238                 for (Change rollback : rollBackChanges) {
00239                     for (SqlStatement statement : rollback.generateStatements(database)) {
00240                         try {
00241                             database.getJdbcTemplate().execute(statement);
00242                         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00243                             throw new RollbackFailedException("Error executing custom SQL [" + statement + "]", e);
00244                         }
00245                     }
00246                 }
00247 
00248             } else {
00249                 List<Change> changes = getChanges();
00250                 for (int i = changes.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00251                     Change change = changes.get(i);
00252                     change.executeRollbackStatements(database);
00253                     log.finest(change.getConfirmationMessage());
00254                 }
00255             }
00256 
00257             database.commit();
00258             log.finest("ChangeSet " + toString() + " has been successfully rolled back.");
00259         } catch (Exception e) {
00260             try {
00261                 database.rollback();
00262             } catch (JDBCException e1) {
00263                 ;
00264             }
00265             throw new RollbackFailedException(e);
00266         }
00267 
00268     }
00269 
00273     public List<Change> getChanges() {
00274         return Collections.unmodifiableList(changes);
00275     }

00277     public void addChange(Change change) {
00278         changes.add(change);
00279         change.setChangeSet(this);
00280     }

00298     public String toString(boolean includeMD5Sum) {
00299         return filePath + "::" + getId() + "::" + getAuthor() + (includeMD5Sum ? ("::(MD5Sum: " + getMd5sum() + ")") : "");
00300     }
00301 
00302     public String toString() {
00303         return toString(true);
00304     }

00307         return comments;

00310     public void setComments(String comments) {
00311         this.comments = comments;

00314     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00315         Element node = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("changeSet");
00316         node.setAttribute("id", getId());
00317         node.setAttribute("author", getAuthor());
00318 
00319         if (alwaysRun) {
00320             node.setAttribute("alwaysRun", "true");
00321         }
00322 
00323         if (runOnChange) {
00324             node.setAttribute("runOnChange", "true");
00325         }
00326 
00327         if (failOnError != null) {
00328             node.setAttribute("failOnError", failOnError.toString());
00329         }
00330 
00331         if (getContexts() != null && getContexts().size() > 0) {
00332             StringBuffer contextString = new StringBuffer();
00333             for (String context : getContexts()) {
00334                 contextString.append(context).append(",");
00335             }
00336             node.setAttribute("context", contextString.toString().replaceFirst(",$", ""));
00337         }
00338 
00339         if (getDbmsSet() != null && getDbmsSet().size() > 0) {
00340             StringBuffer dbmsString = new StringBuffer();
00341             for (String dbms : getDbmsSet()) {
00342                 dbmsString.append(dbms).append(",");
00343             }
00344             node.setAttribute("dbms", dbmsString.toString().replaceFirst(",$", ""));
00345         }
00346 
00347         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getComments()) != null) {
00348             Element commentsElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("comment");
00349             Text commentsText = currentChangeLogDOM.createTextNode(getComments());
00350             commentsElement.appendChild(commentsText);
00351             node.appendChild(commentsElement);
00352         }
00353 
00354 
00355         for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00356             node.appendChild(change.createNode(currentChangeLogDOM));
00357         }
00358         return node;
00359     }
00360 
00361     public Change[] getRollBackChanges() {
00362         return rollBackChanges.toArray(new Change[rollBackChanges.size()]);
00363     }
00364 
00365     public void addRollBackSQL(String sql) {
00366         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(sql) == null) {
00367             return;
00368         }
00369 
00370         for (String statment : StringUtils.splitSQL(sql)) {
00371             rollBackChanges.add(new RawSQLChange(statment.trim()));
00372         }
00373     }
00374 
00375     public void addRollbackChange(Change change) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00376         rollBackChanges.add(change);
00377     }
00378 
00379 
00380     public boolean canRollBack() {
00381         if (rollBackChanges != null && rollBackChanges.size() > 0) {
00382             return true;
00383         }
00384 
00385         for (Change change : getChanges()) {
00386             if (!change.canRollBack()) {
00387                 return false;
00388             }
00389         }
00390         return true;
00391     }
00392 
00393     public String getDescription() {
00394         List<Change> changes = getChanges();
00395         if (changes.size() == 0) {
00396             return "Empty";
00397         }
00398 
00399         StringBuffer returnString = new StringBuffer();
00400         Class<? extends Change> lastChangeClass = null;
00401         int changeCount = 0;
00402         for (Change change : changes) {
00403             if (change.getClass().equals(lastChangeClass)) {
00404                 changeCount++;
00405             } else if (changeCount > 1) {
00406                 returnString.append(" (x").append(changeCount).append(")");
00407                 returnString.append(", ");
00408                 returnString.append(change.getChangeName());
00409                 changeCount = 1;
00410             } else {
00411                 returnString.append(", ").append(change.getChangeName());
00412                 changeCount = 1;
00413             }
00414             lastChangeClass = change.getClass();
00415         }
00416 
00417         if (changeCount > 1) {
00418             returnString.append(" (x").append(changeCount).append(")");
00419         }
00420 
00421         return returnString.toString().replaceFirst("^, ", "");
00422     }

00432     public void addValidCheckSum(String text) {
00433         validCheckSums.add(text);
00434     }
00435 
00436     public boolean isCheckSumValid(String storedCheckSum) {
00437         String currentMd5Sum = getMd5sum();
00438         if (currentMd5Sum == null) {
00439             return true;
00440         }
00441         if (storedCheckSum == null) {
00442             return true;
00443         }
00444         if (currentMd5Sum.equals(storedCheckSum)) {
00445             return true;
00446         }
00447 
00448         for (String validCheckSum : validCheckSums) {
00449             if (currentMd5Sum.equals(validCheckSum)) {
00450                 return true;
00451             }
00452         }
00453         return false;  //To change body of created methods use File | Settings | File Templates.
00454     }

00456     public void setPreconditions(Preconditions preconditions) {
00457         this.rootPrecondition = preconditions;
00458     }
